name: Reveal Fantasia
storyline: Play as Mariel Woodworth: She lost her mother at an early age, and while her father is a fairy tamer himself, she is being raised by her guardian fairy, Fiona. With a pure, bright and obedient disposition, she is adored by the other villagers of Oakberry. This adorable 14 year-old girl with the country bumpkin hairstyle is the heroine of this story.
summary: Reveal Fantasia Is a Fantasy role playing video game released in 2002 for the PlayStation 2 console by Victor Interactive Software, Inc. in Japan. The game involved an innovative concept of a role playing game involving no battles or fighting. Its game play shows some influence from dating simulation games.
